name: The Bar
description: You are standing in the Bar, the common area of DEItizens. It is quite crowded at this time, as a line of people extends from the Bar Counter — awaiting service — and all the tables are filled with burnt out looking students.
directions:
To your North is the Bar Counter.
To your East is the main Corridor.
To your West are the Stairs.
And to your South is an Elevator.
